hero.title: Affiliations & Approvals
hero.intro: Every program at Shivalik College is backed by national councils, statutory bodies, and reputed universities so students graduate with credentials that travel anywhere.

approvals.title: AICTE-approved college
approvals.subtitle: All India Council for Technical Education
approvals.description: Shivalik College of Engineering is approved by AICTE, validating that every engineering specialization aligns with national quality benchmarks and emerging industry needs.

approvals.title: Affiliated to UTU
approvals.subtitle: Veer Madho Singh Bhandari Uttarakhand Technical University
approvals.description: The College of Engineering and College of Pharmacy deliver UTU-affiliated B.Tech and B.Pharm programs, ensuring students earn degrees recognized across India.

approvals.title: Affiliated to UBTER
approvals.subtitle: Uttarakhand Board of Technical Education, Roorkee
approvals.description: Polytechnic and Diploma in Pharmacy offerings are affiliated with UBTER, connecting learners to a rigorous state-wide technical education framework.

approvals.title: Approved by PCI
approvals.subtitle: Pharmacy Council of India
approvals.description: The College of Pharmacy is PCI-approved, combining compliant curricula with intensive practical exposure inside purpose-built labs.

approvals.title: Recognized by MHRD
approvals.subtitle: Ministry of Human Resource Development
approvals.description: National recognition from the MHRD affirms that Shivalik College operates with the governance, infrastructure, and academic standards mandated for premier institutions.

approvals.title: Affiliated with SDSUU
approvals.subtitle: Sri Dev Suman Uttarakhand University
approvals.description: Select programs are affiliated with SDSUU, enabling interdisciplinary collaborations and a robust academic credit framework.

approvals.title: Accredited with an NAAC A+ Grade
approvals.subtitle: National Assessment and Accreditation Council
approvals.description: NAAC A+ accreditation reflects Shivalik's investment in research-ready labs, high-impact faculty, and holistic student services.

approvals.title: Recognized under Section 2(f)
approvals.subtitle: University Grants Commission
approvals.description: Section 2(f) recognition confirms the college complies with UGC norms, paving the way for grants, research tie-ups, and advanced degree pathways.
